languages.text: {n}Хохот великана бьет в грудь, словно удар акустического орудия.{/n} "Славно! Я хотел поведать о черном проклятьи Вульфена, но твой ответ тоже недурен! Гнев-барсук, ха!"

{n}The giant warrior's chuckle slams into your chest like a strike from a sonic weapon.{/n} "Very good! I hoped to tell you about the black curse of the Wulfen, but your answer wasn't bad either! Wrath-badger, ha!"
languages.original_text: {n}Хохот великана бьет в грудь, словно удар акустического орудия.{/n} "Славно! Я хотел поведать о черном проклятьи Вульфена, но твой ответ тоже недурен! Гнев-барсук, ха!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The giant warrior's deafening chuckle slams into your chest like a strike from a sonic weapon. The red-haired Space Wolf slaps a shovel-like hand on your shoulder.{/n} "Very good! I hoped to tell you about the black curse of Wulfen that lurks in the soul of every wolf and calls us to wreak bloody and joyless carnage. But your answer wasn't bad either! Wrath-badger, ha!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The giant warrior's deafening chuckle slams into your chest like a strike from a sonic weapon. The red-haired Space Wolf slaps a shovel-like hand on your shoulder.{/n} "Very good! I hoped to tell you about the black curse of Wulfen that lurks in the soul of every wolf and calls us to wreak bloody and joyless carnage. But your answer wasn't bad either! Wrath-badger, ha!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The giant warrior's chuckle slams into your chest like a strike from a sonic weapon.{/n} "Very good! I hoped to tell you about the black curse of the Wulfen, but your answer wasn't bad either! Wrath-badger, ha!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}这位壮硕的战士哈哈大笑起来。他的笑声就像声波武器一样，猛烈地撞击着你的胸膛。{/n}“相当不错！我本打算和你说说可怕的狼人诅咒，不过你这个答案也相当不错！怒獾，哈！”
languages.original_text: {n}The giant warrior's chuckle slams into your chest like a strike from a sonic weapon.{/n} "Very good! I hoped to tell you about the black curse of the Wulfen, but your answer wasn't bad either! Wrath-badger, ha!"

traits.locale_text: {n}这位壮硕的战士哈哈大笑起来。他的笑声就像声波武器一样，猛烈地撞击着你的胸膛。{/n}“相当不错！我本打算和你说说可怕的狼人诅咒，不过你这个答案也相当不错！怒獾，哈！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}La risotada del gigante golpea tu pecho como un arma sónica.{/n} «¡Muy buena! Quería hablarle de la oscura maldición de los Wulfen, ¡pero su respuesta también es buena! ¡El tejón furioso, ja!».
languages.original_text: {n}The giant warrior's chuckle slams into your chest like a strike from a sonic weapon.{/n} "Very good! I hoped to tell you about the black curse of the Wulfen, but your answer wasn't bad either! Wrath-badger, ha!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La risotada del gigante golpea tu pecho como un arma sónica.{/n} «¡Muy buena! Quería hablarle de la oscura maldición de los Wulfen, ¡pero su respuesta también es buena! ¡El tejón furioso, ja!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}巨大な戦士の笑い声が、まるで音波兵器の一撃のように、あなたの胸に叩きつけられる。{/n}「いいじゃないか！黒き狂狼の呪いについて話すつもりだったが、お前の答えも悪くはない！ラス・バッジャーとはな！」
languages.original_text: {n}The giant warrior's chuckle slams into your chest like a strike from a sonic weapon.{/n} "Very good! I hoped to tell you about the black curse of the Wulfen, but your answer wasn't bad either! Wrath-badger, ha!"

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大な戦士の笑い声が、まるで音波兵器の一撃のように、あなたの胸に叩きつけられる。{/n}「いいじゃないか！黒き狂狼の呪いについて話すつもりだったが、お前の答えも悪くはない！ラス・バッジャーとはな！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Das Lachen des riesigen Kriegers kracht in deine Brust wie der Schlag einer Schallwaffe.{/n} "Sehr gut! Ich hatte gehofft, Euch vom schwarzen Fluch des Wulfen zu berichten, doch Eure Antwort war auch nicht übel! Zornesdachs, ha!"
languages.original_text: {n}The giant warrior's chuckle slams into your chest like a strike from a sonic weapon.{/n} "Very good! I hoped to tell you about the black curse of the Wulfen, but your answer wasn't bad either! Wrath-badger, ha!"

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le rire du guerrier géant résonne dans votre poitrine comme la frappe d'une arme sonique.{/n} « Excellent ! Je voulais vous parler de la sombre Malédiction du Wulfen, mais votre réponse n'était pas mal non plus ! Le blaireau colérique, ha ! ».
languages.original_text: {n}The giant warrior's chuckle slams into your chest like a strike from a sonic weapon.{/n} "Very good! I hoped to tell you about the black curse of the Wulfen, but your answer wasn't bad either! Wrath-badger, ha!"

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The giant warrior's chuckle slams into your chest like a strike from a sonic weapon.{/n} "Very good! I hoped to tell you about the black curse of the Wulfen, but your answer wasn't bad either! Wrath-badger, ha!"

languages.text: {n}Dev savaşçının kahkahası, sonik bir silahın patlaması gibi göğsüne darbe indiriyor.{/n} "Çok güzel! Sana Börü'nün kara lanetini anlatacaktım ama senin cevabın da hiç fena değildi! Gazap porsuğu ha!"
languages.original_text: {n}The giant warrior's chuckle slams into your chest like a strike from a sonic weapon.{/n} "Very good! I hoped to tell you about the black curse of the Wulfen, but your answer wasn't bad either! Wrath-badger, ha!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Dev savaşçının kahkahası, sonik bir silahın patlaması gibi göğsüne bir darbe indiriyor.{/n} "Çok güzel! Sana Börü'nün kara lanetini anlatacaktım ama senin cevabın da hiç fena değildi! Gazab-ı porsuk, ha!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
